page.title: 07SHOPPING SURVEY,WATERLANE
page.content: Waterlane is a small hamlet of about 50 houses.There are{no shops}the nearest villages,Bisley and Oakridge about quarter of a mile away.The closest town is Stroud,about four and a half miles away.The people have to travel in order to shop.The favourite {village shop}was in{Oakridge}and it attracted three times as many people customers as the{Bisley shop.}Most people went by car to these shops except four people who walked and two who used mopeds.Weekly shopping was :_ {Oakridge(12),Cirencester(8),Stroud(6), {Bisley(6),Gloucester(1)& Cheltenham(1) Items ordered by telephone are deliverd to Waterlane and include {bread, groceries}and{meat}from a butchers in Chalford Hill.When asked what type of shop they would like in waterlane the majority nominated a {general store.
